DOC.brief_summary: The purpose prospective study compare hip adductor strength obturator nerve palsy acetabular fracture patient whose fracture reduce fixate use modify Stoppa approach ( subject ) pelvic fracture patient ( control ) use physical strength testing , radiograph , clinical assessment , validate functional outcome questionnaire . The investigator ' research hypothesis less strength high incidence obturator nerve palsy patient treat modified Stoppa approach ( intervention ) patient treat without modify Stoppa approach ( control ) .
DOC.brief_title: Hip Strength Nerve Palsy After Modified Stoppa Approach Acetabular Fracture Reduction Fixation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion subject patient population study consist male female adult , least 18 year old , acetabular fracture treat modified Stoppa approach . Inclusion criterion control patient population study consist male female adult , least 18 year old , acetabular fracture similar fracture pattern study group treat approach Stoppa approach . Exclusion criterion subject control patient population consist : Patients nonambulatory . Patients le 18 year age . Patients speak English . Patients unable complete followup Utah .
